title: Magazine branding guidelines
content: I have found a lot of great branding/design guideline PDF manuals for companies like Napster,Ebay, US army etc. I can't seem to find any branding guidelines for magazines. Does anyone have anything of this nature? or know any good resources? Scribd.com is a good place to find branding guidelines and any other type of document. Thanks.
author: koop

comments.content: I would guess that most magazine guidelines would be for internal use, companies often have to make those things public because they work with outside vendors.
